snippet: NOAA is out with a report detailing how the first six months of 2012 are the hottest on record in terms of average national temperatures for the lower 48 states.
abstract: NOAA is out with a report detailing how the first six months of 2012 are the hottest on record in terms of average national temperatures for the lower 48 states.

headline.main: Record High Temperatures in the First Six Months of the Year
